messages.subject: Introduction and conference comments
messages.msgSnippet: Ren might balk at the idea of really HUGE name tags.  I don t even like nametags...but I obediently wore mine the whole weekend.:) Kathryn had all these
messages.messageBody:
" Ren might balk at the idea of really HUGE name tags. <g>"

I don't even like nametags...but I obediently wore mine the whole
weekend.:) Kathryn had all these cute little ribbons to add at the
bottom, for speakers and funshops presenters. The funshops ones said
"Plays well with others".

The most dangerous place we ended up this last time, was the Shu Umera
store, where I purchased a massive false lash (to be cut up) and some
eyeshadow. Never did convince Jon to wear any of it, though Ben was
quite agreeable that way.;)

Maybe we should do a tattoo funshop in Albuquerque, and do an offsite
"field trip"? Ooooh yes.

Ren
learninginfreedom.com
